articles.description: JOHNSON CITY, Tenn. (WJHL)- Ballad Health’s Chief Infection Prevention Officer Jamie Swift posted on social media late last week that she was hospitalized due to COVID-19. In a statement to News Channel 11, Swift said the following: “As I continue to recover …

articles.description: For the first time in history, TikTok is tailoring its yearly recap to its users.
articles.content: 2020 was a rollercoaster year for TikTok. A constantly changing deadline from the Trump administration meant the company spent most of the year unsure of it would still be around to see the end of it… [+731 chars]
